org.hps.readout

Class SignalOverlayDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.readout.SignalOverlayDriver

  • public class SignalOverlayDriver
extends Driver
    Overlay signal event collections every N events, applying optional filters to reject unwanted events.
